title: Bedcover, "Log Raft on River", 1964
markings: Front edge: "River Raft (copyright symbol), Spreadmobile designed by Mr. Sid. Everwear (trademarked), Design Patent 3120721-1964, Style 6080."
description: Bedspread with design of a log raft. Bird's eye view of the raft made of logs of three shades of brown, black and white, tied together by ropes, floating on a background of green-blue and white foaming water.  Four corners are curved.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, "Log Raft on River", 1964.Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed. 1970-27-4.
